channel.title: tag3 on Eugenio Pescimoro
channel.description: Recent content in tag3 on Eugenio Pescimoro

item.title: Aquifer simulation
item.description: Part of the modeling work carried out for a European project while at Deltares aimed to calculate the recharge of an aquifer. Numerical simulation of a Spanish aquifer realized with iMOD.

item.title: Groundwater Flow Modeling
item.description: This is a MODFLOW simulation of the flow through the hyporreic zone using particle tracking. The study was conducted as master thesis work and eventually published on Water Resources Research: https://agupubs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1029/2018WR024221. Particle tracking achived through MODPATH.
